data.text: @CityNewsVAN The plandemic has worn very thin on people everyone join together and get rid of these demons.
@CityNewsVAN Stop covering this woman.  She is completely against human life at this point. She wants us live in a perpetual state of fear. And if there is fear, the government can monopolize that.
@CityNewsVAN My GOD, every day with this guy!  🤡 🙄
@CityNewsVAN So get rid of the Federal Vaccine Passport then?

@CityNewsVAN Government public health agencies should never ever be in the business of mandating anything, they should only be providing the citizens information and leave it up to individuals to decide how to protect themselves from disease. These authoritarian measures must end NOW!
